name: Lactulose
indications: lactulose oral solution indicated treatment constipation . patients history chronic constipation , lactulose therapy increases number bowel movements per day number days bowel movements occur .
contraindications: usual adult 10 g 20 g lactulose daily . dose may increased 40 g daily necessary . twenty-four 48 hours may required produce normal bowel movement .
warningsAndPrecautions: lactulose oral solution available single dose packets 10 g ( ndc 0121-0965-01 ) single dose packets 20 g ( ndc 0121-1930-01 ) . packets supplied follows : ndc 0121-0965-30 ( carton thirty 10 g packets ) ndc 0121-1930-30 ( carton thirty 20 g packets ) store room temperature , 15°-30°c ( 59°-86°f ) . report suspected , contact pai pharma 1-800-845-8210 fda 1-800-fda-1088 www.fda.gov/medwatch . manufactured : pai pharma greenville , sc 29605 issued : november 2024 in791624
adverseReactions: since lactulose oral solution contains galactose ( less 0.3 g/10 g total sum lactose ) , contraindicated patients require low galactose diet .
indications_original: Lactulose for Oral Solution is indicated for the treatment of constipation. In patients with a history of chronic constipation, lactulose therapy increases the number of bowel movements per day and the number of days on which bowel movements occur.
contraindications_original: The usual adult dosage is 10 g to 20 g of lactulose daily. The dose may be increased to 40 g daily if necessary. Twenty-four to 48 hours may be required to produce a normal bowel movement.
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
Lactulose for Oral Solution is available in single dose packets of 10 g (NDC 0121-0965-01) and single dose packets of 20 g (NDC 0121-1930-01). The packets are supplied as follows:
                  NDC 0121-0965-30
(Carton of thirty 10 g packets)
                  NDC 0121-1930-30
(Carton of thirty 20 g packets)
                  STORE AT ROOM TEMPERATURE, 15°-30°C (59°-86°F).
                  
                     To report SUSPECTED ADVERSE REACTIONS, contact PAI Pharma at 1-800-845-8210 or FDA at 1-800-FDA-1088 or 
                     
                        www.fda.gov/medwatch.
                     
                  
                  Manufactured for:
PAI Pharma
Greenville, SC 29605
                  Issued: November 2024
IN791624
adverseReactions_original: Since Lactulose for Oral Solution contains galactose (less than 0.3 g/10 g as a total sum with lactose), it is contraindicated in patients who require a low galactose diet.
